ul:
<li<%-if not scheme then%> class="menu-active"<%-end-%>> <a href="<%=self:_index_filename()%>">Index
<% for k, v in luci.util.kspairs(self.schemes) do %> <li<%-if scheme == k then%> class="menu-active"<%-end-%>> <a href="<%=self:_scheme_filename(k)%>"><%=k%> <%-if scheme == k then-%>
<%-for k2, v2 in luci.util.kspairs(v.sections) do%>
<a href="<%=self:_section_filename(k, k2)%>"><%=k2%> <%end-%>
<%-end%>
<%-end%>
